notes: Rites of Eloshar can give at most 2.5 mana regeneration bonus. With max stacks and its duration, it can regenerate up to a total of 25 mana.
With max stacks and its duration, it can regenerate up to a total of 25 mana.
Each stack places a new hidden modifier buff on its wielder. This means their durations are independent from each other. The number of stacks can be seen on the status buff icon.
The number of stacks can be seen on the status buff icon.
abilities.description: Each time the wearer is attacked they gain a stack of 0.5 mana regen, up to 5 stacks. Stacks last for 10 seconds.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
3 main attack damage to all / / heroes.
name: Occult Bracelet
description: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.
